businessplan.title: Business-Plan of www.createyourevent.org / www.heartfull-mind.org
businessplan.info:
We work according to the business plan as it is done by us at www.heartfull-mind.org, our parents' family, i.e. the headquarters. We also adhere to all points stated on this business plan. Below you can see our business plan as a mind map showing which values are involved. 

 With kind regards 

 Urs Baumann, CEO and owner of www.createyourevent.org a subunit of www.heartfull-mind.org
